amendment.description: Amendment sought to modify and extend the scope of the report required by Section 1043 of the Fiscal Year 2012 National Defense Authorization Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 to modify and extend the scope of the report required by Section 1043 of the Fiscal Year 2012 National Defense Authorization Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 232 (Roll no. 363).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 232 (Roll no. 363).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
